name: Desnude
description:
Desnude is a visual novel about Lis, a girl in a discovery  process about her body, sexuality, relationships, respect and consent.

Starting her studies in a computer science college, she will meet new people and live experiences she never imagined to be possible at the small town in which she lived. Through Lis's conflicts and learning, the game will address themes of positive sex education, valuing pleasure and consent.

This is a Demo that contains only two chapters of the game.

Developers

Art: Gabi Pinto

Game Design: Bruna Lucchesi, Nelson Donato and Gabi Pinto

Programming: Bruna Lucchesi and Felipe Pessoa
